titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: SUBSTANCE USE IN THE LAST THREE MONTHS INDICATOR (UNCLASSIFIED SUBSTANCE) - Description

div.p: SUBSTANCE USE IN THE LAST THREE MONTHS INDICATOR (UNCLASSIFIED SUBSTANCE) is the same as attribute SUBSTANCE USE IN THE LAST THREE MONTHS INDICATOR, to indicate whether the PERSON has used an Unclassified SUBSTANCE within the last three months.
